name: Wizart AR Room Visualizer WordPress Plugin: New Standard of Selling Home Improvement Products
author: Wizart

sections.description:
Wizart AR Room Visualizer – the unmatched and realistic home improvement product visualization tool driving customer engagement and boosting sales. Wizart offers a set of cutting-edge solutions for your home improvement online catalogs, web stores, and eCommerce businesses.

Wizart AR Room Visualizer is based on a neural network that means continuous visualization quality improvement. Visualizer has a user-friendly interface and your customers get the visualization result in three simple steps: they upload their interior, pick the product, and see if it fits their interior. As a result, retailers and manufacturers build customer loyalty and increase customer engagement up to 27%.

Wizart AR Room Visualizer works with any type of products:
– Wallcoverings
– Murals
– Flooring
– Paints
– Tiles
– Wall art
– Carpets & rugs
– Custom-made home décor products
– Any other products upon your request

Wizart AR Room Visualizer WordPress Plugin allows you to install the Visualizer in a few clicks. Please note that the Visualizer usage is based on subscription payments. See our detailed pricing here.

Contact Wizart Help Center to learn how Wizart AR Room Visualizer WordPress Plugin can benefit your business or if you have any issues with plugin installation

Check our demo

See the app in action

Benefits of Wizart AR Room Visualizer:
– Lower returns as customers are much less likely to return the purchased product if they tried it before buying;
– 5x increase in conversions thanks to higher engagement rate;
– 4x shortened transaction cycle with a faster decision-making process;
– Wow-effect driving customer loyalty and adding fun to their virtual shopping experience.

Wizart AR Room Visualizer additional features:
– AR room visualizer to eliminate imagination gap;
– PIM system to manage data and get access to 100+ manufacturers’ data across the globe;
– Wizart Data Logistics & Insights Dashboard to receive regular updates on customer engagement, sales, and market shifts;
– Rich content tools to enhance your PDPs with interactive content to increase engagement rate;
– Vision API to create 3D room layouts and interior scenes.

Wizart AR Room Visualizer WordPress Plugin allows:
– Easy integration – Wizart Plugin will get you up and running in a few clicks;
– Advanced customization – customize the app with your brand elements to make it stand out;
– Shopping cart support – link the app’s cart to your eCommerce store for a seamless shopping experience;
– Tailored to customers’ needs – customize your room scenes or use customers’ own photos.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Wizart AR Room Visualizer WordPress Plugin to your WordPress admin panel from the Plugins tab.
  2. Follow our step-by-step guide for a super-easy integration.

Or watch the video showcasing the whole process of Wizart AR Room Visualizer WordPress Plugin implementation.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

Release Date – 10 June 2024

  • Updated settings design
  • Added more button customization options.
  • Used webhook woocommerce_before_single_product in product page

1.0.11

Release Date – 23 November 2022

  • Stabilization

1.0.10

Release Date – 17 November 2022

  • Performance improvements

1.0.9

Release Date – 18 October 2022

  • Updated domain name

1.0.8

Release Date – 11 March 2022

  • Updated link scripts to AWS

1.0.7

Release Date – 03 September 2021

  • Added disable uploading photos

1.0.6.2

Release Date – 12 Jule 2021

  • Added using sku instead of vendor_code for two-way shopping cart synchronization

1.0.6.1

Release Date – 11 June 2021

  • Fixed send analytics for iframe method

1.0.6

Release Date – 31 May 2021

  • Added new parameters for floating and entry buttons

1.0.5

Release Date – 05 April 2021

  • Added context

1.0.4

Release Date – 03 February 2021

  • Display render floating button for iframe method

1.0.3

Release Date – 02 February 2021

  • Added cache for render button
  • Displaying the integration button when using the plugin Elementor
